titleStmt.title: The late converts exposed, or, The reasons of Mr. Bays's changing his religion considered in a dialogue : part the second : with reflections on the life of St. Xavier, Don Sebastian King of Portugal, as also the fable of the bat and the birds.
titleStmt.author: Brown, Thomas, 1663-1704.

notesStmt.note: Pt. 1 was previously published as: The reasons of Mr. Bays changing his religion. London, 1688. Pt. 3 was published as: The reasons of Mr. Joseph Hains, the player's conversion and re-conversion. 1690.
Satire by Thomas Brown on Dryden's conversion. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
